# AhmadLib 🔥

A fun Python library that celebrates Ahmad — the best programmer in the world! 🌍💻

## 🔥 Features

- `who_is_best_programmer()`
- `ahmad_mood()`
- `future_goal()`
- `motivate_ahmad()`

## 🚀 How to Use

```python
import ahmadlib

print(ahmadlib.who_is_best_programmer())
